modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here's the corrected HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description:

- Corrected HTML:
<input type="text" name="SearchFilterFilterSearchTerm" id="SearchFilterFilterSearchTerm" autocomplete="off" aria-invalid="false" class="hero-search-listing Typeahead tt-input" onfocus="if (!window.__cfRLUnblockHandlers) return false; this.placeholder =''" placeholder="Where would you like to go?" maxlength="30" spellcheck="false" dir="auto" aria-activedescendant="" aria-owns="SearchFilterFilterSearchTerm_listbox" role="combobox" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="SearchFilterFilterSearchTerm_listbox" aria-autocomplete="list" style="position: relative; vertical-align: top; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);">

Explanation:
The WCAG 2.1 violation description mentioned that the required ARIA attributes `aria-expanded` and `aria-controls` were missing. To fix this:

1. Added the `aria-expanded` attribute and set its value to "false" to indicate that the combobox is currently collapsed.
2. Added the `aria-controls` attribute and set its value
